metadata.title: CVE-2022-28961 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: Spip Web Framework v3.1.13 and below was discovered to contain multiple SQLinjection vulnerabilities at /ecrire via the lier_trad and whereparameters.

criterions.comment: spip: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
